mapper.select: SELECT b.subject_no subjectNo ,a.member_id memberId ,a.student_name studentName ,a.student_gender studentGender ,a.student_phone studentPhone ,a.student_address studentAddress ,a.student_detailaddress studentDetailAddress ,a.student_email studentEmail ,a.student_education studentEducation ,a.student_register_date studentRegisterDate ,a.update_date updateDate FROM student AS a INNER JOIN subject_student AS b ON a.member_id = b.member_id ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 10
